title: Reproducible Workflows
text:
The main presentation is available here!
The GitHub site is available here

The following are supplemental resources that could be useful:

Basics of git and GitHub
Information for using RStudio with GitHub
Information about using Markdown and Quarto.
Information about creating a web site with quarto and GitHub.
Information for using Google Colab with Github

Here are some example projects that include instructions for the use of a Markdown narrative:

R-based project on querying an API and summarize the returned data
R-based project on exploring data, fitting models, and building an API with a docker container
